title: runtui: Split model.go (~3400 lines) into 6 focused files
description: model.go is ~3400 lines with 70+ methods. Split into: model.go (core lifecycle), model_view.go (rendering), model_stream.go (stream processing), model_parsers.go (provider parsers), model_state.go (state/geometry), model_scroll.go (scrolling). Also deduplicate appendXList and xDetailLines methods. Relates to phase p2-runtui-refactor.
